author: timbeiko
content: So, assume you have 1800 validators exiting per day, then that's 1800*34 ETH (on average) = 61200 ETH per day of full withdrawals. If you then filled all the rest of withdrawal capacity with partial withdrawals (~2ETH on average for the first scan, then much less), you'd get 7200 blocks x 16 withdrawals/block = 115200 withdrawals per day, of which 1800 were full withdrawals, so (115200-1800)x2=226800 ETH in partial withdrawals. So ~300k total for the first scan.

author: timbeiko
content: This is also a conservative estimate because not all validators will have valid withdrawal credentials set.

author: fundedcrypto
content: I'm also sure that's a very conservative figure, due to the reasons citeed (withdrawal credentials) + what's already liquid out there from LSDs, clear as crystal, appreciate it
